mapper.select: select prescriptionInfoId, prescriptionName from prescription_info where prescriptionInfoId = #{prescriptionInfoId}
select * from prescription_info where prescriptionName like concat("%", #{prescriptionName}, "%")
select * from prescription_info where prescriptionInfoId in (select prescriptionInfoId from pi_b_r where bookId = #{bookId})
select * from prescription_info where prescriptionInfoId in (select prescriptionInfoId from pi_d_r where diseaseId = #{diseaseId})
select * from prescription_info where prescriptionInfoId in (select prescriptionInfoId from pi_h_r where herbId = #{herbId})
mapper.insert: insert into prescription_info(prescriptionName, prescriptionCompose, prescriptionProvenance, prescriptionAttend, prescriptionUsageDosage, prescriptionPreparationFunction, compose) values(#{prescriptionName}, #{prescriptionCompose}, #{prescriptionProvenance}, #{prescriptionAttend}, #{prescriptionUsageDosage}, #{prescriptionPreparationFunction}, #{compose})
